subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry moved into a three-way tie for the lead through at the John Deere Classic, and Paula Creamer still held a four-stroke lead at the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic.
snippet: Kenny Perry moved into a three-way tie for the lead through at the John Deere Classic, and Paula Creamer still held a four-stroke lead at the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic.
